abstract: DealBook Online; Zurich Insurance Group abandons pursuit of rival RSA Insurance Group; announces expected losses of around $275 million on insurance claims related to Tianjin, China, explosions.
lead_paragraph: The insurer also said it was reviewing its general operations and expected losses of about $275 million on claims related to explosions in China.

headline.main: Zurich Insurance Ends Pursuit of RSA of Britain

snippet: The insurer also said it was reviewing its general operations and expected losses of about $275 million on claims related to explosions in China.
